original_title: Rail bus services on northern line distrupted
original_body_lines: The rail bus service was disrupted this evening due to a derailment after a tree had fallen on the tracks between Polgawela and Potuhera railway stations, the Sri Lanka Railways Station Masters' Union (SLRSMU) said.
They said the railway services on the northern line between Colombo Fort and Pothuhera were also limited. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
